warning: you don\'t seem to have sufficient permission to access this campaign at this time.

the privacy of the campaign determines in part who can view the data that you upload.

a campaign may be in one of two privacy states:
* private, only you and the administrator can see your data
* shared, administrators, authors, and analysts can see your public data
